name: Mizukura
description:
3D CROSS Project developed by 2nd year students of the Games Development and Global Design courses (2020/2021).

Programmers:

  • Terry Keyrouz
  • Vasco Soares

Artists:

  • Beatriz Artilheiro
  • Filipe Pacheco
  • Lourenço Trindade
  • Mariana Pires de Lima
  • Paulo Arinto

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Walk
  • Space - Jump
  • Control - Sneaking
  • Shift - Running / Rolling
  • E - Interactions
  • Q - Target lock
  • R - Hunter sense
  • Mouse2 + Mouse1 - Shurikens
  • Mouse1 - All out
  • E - Assassinate
  • TAB - Close/Open objective tag
  • Esc - Pause menu

For more information about the university and the Games Development B.Sc., visit this link: https://www.iade.europeia.pt/en/courses/undergraduate/global-bachelor/games-deve...
